bignlp 0.0.4

Stanford CoreNLP Annotator Class.

AnnotatorCoreNLP.Rd

Stanford CoreNLP Annotator Class.

AnnotatorCoreNLP

Format

An object of class R6ClassGenerator of length 24.

Fields

tagger

Class from Stanford CoreNLP to annotate text

xmlifier

Class from Stanford CoreNLP to generate XML output

jsonifier

Class from Stanford CoreNLP to generate JSON output

writer

Class from Stanford CoreNLP to generate TXT output

append

logical, whether to append output to destfile

method

whith output format to use

cols_to_keep

columns from output to keep

destfile

filename

Examples

Sys.setenv("_JAVA_OPTIONS" = "")
options(java.parameters = "-Xmx4g")
if (getOption("bignlp.corenlp_dir") == "") corenlp_install(lang = "de")

txt <- "Das ist ein Satz. Und das ist ein zweiter Satz."

CNLP <- AnnotatorCoreNLP$new(
  method = "json",
  corenlp_dir = getOption("bignlp.corenlp_dir"),
  properties_file = corenlp_get_properties_file(lang = "de")
  )
#> Status of the Java Virtual Machine: 0
#> Java version: 1.8.0_144-b01
CNLP$annotate(txt = txt)
#> [1] "{ \"sentences\": [ { \"index\": 0, \"tokens\": [ { \"index\": 1, \"word\": \"Das\", \"originalText\": \"Das\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 0, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 3, \"pos\": \"PDS\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \"\", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 2, \"word\": \"ist\", \"originalText\": \"ist\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 4, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 7, \"pos\": \"VAFIN\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 3, \"word\": \"ein\", \"originalText\": \"ein\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 8, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 11, \"pos\": \"ART\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 4, \"word\": \"Satz\", \"originalText\": \"Satz\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 12, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 16, \"pos\": \"NN\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \"\" }, { \"index\": 5, \"word\": \".\", \"originalText\": \".\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 16, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 17, \"pos\": \"$.\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \"\", \"after\": \" \" } ] }, { \"index\": 1, \"tokens\": [ { \"index\": 1, \"word\": \"Und\", \"originalText\": \"Und\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 18, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 21, \"pos\": \"KON\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 2, \"word\": \"das\", \"originalText\": \"das\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 22, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 25, \"pos\": \"PDS\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 3, \"word\": \"ist\", \"originalText\": \"ist\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 26, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 29, \"pos\": \"VAFIN\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 4, \"word\": \"ein\", \"originalText\": \"ein\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 30, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 33, \"pos\": \"ART\", \"ADJA\", \"ner\": \"O\", \"before\": \" \", \"after\": \" \" }, { \"index\": 6, \"word\": \"Satz\", \"originalText\": \"Satz\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 42, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 46, \"pos\": CNLP$annotate(txt = txt, id = 15L)
#> [1] "{\"id\": 15,  \"sentences\": [ { \"index\": 0, \"tokens\": [ { \"index\": 1, \"word\": \"Das\", \"originalText\": \"Das\", \"characterOffsetBegin\": 0, \"characterOffsetEnd\": 3, \"pos\": CNLP <- AnnotatorCoreNLP$new(
  method = "xml",
  properties_file = corenlp_get_properties_file(lang = "de")
)
#> Status of the Java Virtual Machine: 1
#> Java version: 1.8.0_144-b01
CNLP$annotate(txt = txt)
#>     sentence id   token   pos ner
#>  1:        1  1     Das   PDS   O
#>  2:        1  2     ist VAFIN   O
#>  3:        1  3     ein   ART   O
#>  4:        1  4    Satz    NN   O
#>  5:        1  5       .    $.   O
#>  6:        2  1     Und   KON   O
#>  7:        2  2     das   PDS   O
#>  8:        2  3     ist VAFIN   O
#>  9:        2  4     ein   ART   O
#> 10:        2  5 zweiter  ADJA   O
#> 11:        2  6    Satz    NN   O
#> 12:        2  7       .    $.   O
